TopicTitle: The Titan Mk IV Extraplanetary Lander

Articles.Content:
All in the title lads.

Been addicted to this game for weeks (playing the Science mode), and I finally attempted to build a true behemoth in order to take me to the farthest planets; as you can see it's a wee bit on the big side

Currently attempting a Laythe landing now - do you have any recommendations as to its layout? Anything you would change etc?
Hmm...you could prolly fit a few more boosters on it...

Hmm...you could prolly fit a few more boosters on it...

Harhar.

I've also successfully tried and tested a "landing module" for the craft; light enough to get out of Earths atmosphere, into orbit and back (so it should work on Laythe too).
